files.description: The primary EHI export documentation PDF (12 pages, v2.0). Contains: overview of the multi-format export approach (C-CDA XML for clinical data, PDF for non-clinical data, FHIR mentioned); step-by-step export instructions with UI screenshots for single-patient and bulk export; a C-CDA data dictionary mapping ~20 CDA sections to XPATHs and code systems (demographics, problems, medications, allergies, labs, vitals, immunizations, procedures, encounters, care team, goals, etc.); brief descriptions of PDF exports for demographics/insurance, appointments, billing, messages, and documents; a single-sentence mention of FHIR Bulk Data EHI Export.
Screenshot of the top of the registered URL page showing it is a CareCloud Prime marketing/product page, not a dedicated EHI documentation page.
Screenshot of the page footer where the EHI export PDF link is located, under 'Real World Testing Plan' heading alongside Real World Testing Plan 2025 and Result 2025 PDF links.
